dleplugin.name: FavAll
dleplugin.description: Модуль позволяет добавлять пользователям собственные закладки
dleplugin.mysqlinstall:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{prefix}_favall` ( `id_fav` smallint(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `position_fav` smallint(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name_fav` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `type_fav` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `user_id_fav` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_fav`) ) ENGINE={engine} DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{prefix}_favall_user` ( `id_list` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_fav_list` smallint(5) NOT NULL, `id_user_list` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_post_list` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_list`) ) ENGINE={engine} DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
